</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 150 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

As you move your body, ki flows into _ki-channeling beads_ you wear and have invested, making them one with your life force. In their usual form, beads are spheres of wood, but versions customized to different martial orders are common. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-1876" />

<document level="2" id="action-1877" />

**Craft Requirements** You are a [monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) with divine ki spells.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
